name: CategoryTheory.StrongEpi.epi
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P Q : C
f : Quiver.Hom P Q
self : CategoryTheory.StrongEpi f
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Epi f
decl:
/-- A strong epimorphism `f` is an epimorphism which has the left lifting property
with respect to monomorphisms. -/
class StrongEpi (f : P ‚ü∂ Q) : Prop where
  /-- The epimorphism condition on `f` -/
  epi : Epi f
  /-- The left lifting property with respect to all monomorphism -/
  llp : ‚àÄ ‚¶ÉX Y : C‚¶Ñ (z : X ‚ü∂ Y) [Mono z], HasLiftingProperty f z

initialProofState:

self : CategoryTheory.StrongEpi f

inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Mono z
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.HasLiftingProperty f z
decl:
/-- A strong epimorphism `f` is an epimorphism which has the left lifting property
with respect to monomorphisms. -/
class StrongEpi (f : P ‚ü∂ Q) : Prop where
  /-- The epimorphism condition on `f` -/
  epi : Epi f
  /-- The left lifting property with respect to all monomorphism -/
  llp : ‚àÄ ‚¶ÉX Y : C‚¶Ñ (z : X ‚ü∂ Y) [Mono z], HasLiftingProperty f z

name: CategoryTheory.StrongEpi.mk'
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P Q : C
f : Quiver.Hom P Q
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Epi f
hf : ‚àÄ (X Y : C) (z : Quiver.Hom X Y), CategoryTheory.Mono z ‚Üí ‚àÄ (u : Quiver.Hom P X) (v : Quiver.Hom Q Y) (sq : CategoryTheory.CommSq u f z v), sq.HasLift
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongEpi f
decl:
theorem StrongEpi.mk' {f : P ‚ü∂ Q} [Epi f]
    (hf : ‚àÄ (X Y : C) (z : X ‚ü∂ Y)
      (_ : Mono z) (u : P ‚ü∂ X) (v : Q ‚ü∂ Y) (sq : CommSq u f z v), sq.HasLift) :
    StrongEpi f :=
  { epi := inferInstance
    llp := fun {X Y} z hz => ‚ü®fun {u v} sq => hf X Y z hz u v sq‚ü© }

name: CategoryTheory.StrongMono.rlp
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C

self : CategoryTheory.StrongMono f
X Y : C
z : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Epi z
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.HasLiftingProperty z f
decl:
/-- A strong monomorphism `f` is a monomorphism which has the right lifting property
with respect to epimorphisms. -/
class StrongMono (f : P ‚ü∂ Q) : Prop where
  /-- The monomorphism condition on `f` -/
  mono : Mono f
  /-- The right lifting property with respect to all epimorphisms -/
  rlp : ‚àÄ ‚¶ÉX Y : C‚¶Ñ (z : X ‚ü∂ Y) [Epi z], HasLiftingProperty z f

decl:
/-- A strong monomorphism `f` is a monomorphism which has the right lifting property
with respect to epimorphisms. -/
class StrongMono (f : P ‚ü∂ Q) : Prop where
  /-- The monomorphism condition on `f` -/
  mono : Mono f
  /-- The right lifting property with respect to all epimorphisms -/
  rlp : ‚àÄ ‚¶ÉX Y : C‚¶Ñ (z : X ‚ü∂ Y) [Epi z], HasLiftingProperty z f

‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongMono f

theorem StrongMono.mk' {f : P ‚ü∂ Q} [Mono f]

name: CategoryTheory.strongEpi_comp
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P Q R : C
f : Quiver.Hom P Q
g : Quiver.Hom Q R
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.StrongEpi f
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.StrongEpi g
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongEpi (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)
decl:
/-- The composition of two strong epimorphisms is a strong epimorphism. -/
theorem strongEpi_comp [StrongEpi f] [StrongEpi g] : StrongEpi (f ‚â´ g) :=
  { epi := epi_comp _ _
    llp := by
      intros
      infer_instance }

‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongMono (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)

/-- The composition of two strong monomorphisms is a strong monomorphism. -/
theorem strongMono_comp [StrongMono f] [StrongMono g] : StrongMono (f ‚â´ g) :=
  { mono := mono_comp _ _
    rlp := by

name: CategoryTheory.strongEpi_of_strongEpi
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P Q R : C
f : Quiver.Hom P Q
g : Quiver.Hom Q R
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.StrongEpi (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongEpi g
decl:
/-- If `f ‚â´ g` is a strong epimorphism, then so is `g`. -/
theorem strongEpi_of_strongEpi [StrongEpi (f ‚â´ g)] : StrongEpi g :=
  { epi := epi_of_epi f g
    llp := fun {X Y} z _ => by
      constructor
      intro u v sq
      have h‚ÇÄ : (f ‚â´ u) ‚â´ z = (f ‚â´ g) ‚â´ v := by simp only [Category.assoc, sq.w]
      exact
        CommSq.HasLift.mk'
          ‚ü®(CommSq.mk h‚ÇÄ).lift, by
            simp only [‚Üê cancel_mono z, Category.assoc, CommSq.fac_right, sq.w], by simp‚ü© }

name: CategoryTheory.strongMono_of_strongMono
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P Q R : C
f : Quiver.Hom P Q
g : Quiver.Hom Q R
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.StrongMono (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongMono f
decl:
/-- If `f ‚â´ g` is a strong monomorphism, then so is `f`. -/
theorem strongMono_of_strongMono [StrongMono (f ‚â´ g)] : StrongMono f :=
  { mono := mono_of_mono f g
    rlp := fun {X Y} z => by
      intros
      constructor
      intro u v sq
      have h‚ÇÄ : u ‚â´ f ‚â´ g = z ‚â´ v ‚â´ g := by
        rw [‚Üê Category.assoc, eq_whisker sq.w, Category.assoc]
      exact CommSq.HasLift.mk' ‚ü®(CommSq.mk h‚ÇÄ).lift, by simp, by simp [‚Üê cancel_epi z, sq.w]‚ü© }

name: CategoryTheory.strongEpi_of_isIso
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
P Q : C
f : Quiver.Hom P Q
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIso f
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongEpi f
decl:
/-- An isomorphism is in particular a strong epimorphism. -/
instance (priority := 100) strongEpi_of_isIso [IsIso f] : StrongEpi f where
  epi := by infer_instance
  llp {_ _} _ := HasLiftingProperty.of_left_iso _ _

name: CategoryTheory.strongMono_of_isIso
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongMono f
decl:

instance (priority := 100) strongMono_of_isIso [IsIso f] : StrongMono f where
  mono := by infer_instance
  rlp {_ _} _ := HasLiftingProperty.of_right_iso _ _

name: CategoryTheory.StrongEpi.of_arrow_iso
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
A B A' B' : C
f : Quiver.Hom A B
g : Quiver.Hom A' B'
e : CategoryTheory.Iso (CategoryTheory.Arrow.mk f) (CategoryTheory.Arrow.mk g)
h : CategoryTheory.StrongEpi f
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.StrongEpi g
decl:
theorem StrongEpi.of_arrow_iso {A B A' B' : C} {f : A ‚ü∂ B} {g : A' ‚ü∂ B'}
    (e : Arrow.mk f ‚âÖ Arrow.mk g) [h : StrongEpi f] : StrongEpi g :=
  { epi := by
      rw [Arrow.iso_w' e]
      infer_instance
    llp := fun {X Y} z => by
      intro
      apply HasLiftingProperty.of_arrow_iso_left e z }

initialProofState:

    (e : Arrow.mk f ‚âÖ Arrow.mk g) [h : StrongMono f] : StrongMono g :=

    rlp := fun {X Y} z => by

theorem isIso_of_mono_of_strongEpi (f : P ‚ü∂ Q) [Mono f] [StrongEpi f] : IsIso f :=
  ‚ü®‚ü®(CommSq.mk (show ùüô P ‚â´ f = f ‚â´ ùüô Q by simp)).lift, by simp‚ü©‚ü©
